entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 10.

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to 1100 metres overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
